column4: how do you turn down the gamma/brightness of a monitor in Ubuntu? (I know i could just adjust the monitor physically, but you have to go through like 10 settings to get to it on this monitor)
Hm dunno, there is a shortcut key here for this, fn+{f5|f6}
Might be just my comp though, dunno
yeah those keys dont do anything on my box, (IF IT was Windows, it would be the Rewind and Play buttons on my HP keyboard for FN + F5/F6) But thanks anyways :)
